name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForInfluenzaVirusAAndBSARSCoronavirus2AndRespiratorySyncytialVirusRNAPanel
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for Influenza Virus A and B, SARS Coronavirus 2, and Respiratory Syncytial Virus RNA Panel
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Influenza Virus A + B, SARS Coronavirus 2, and Respiratory Syncytial Virus RNA Panel),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes panels containing results for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19), respiratory syncitial virus, and influenza virus A & B RNA in respiratory specimens by nucleic acid amplification (NAA).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes individual components of panels.)

concept.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and Respiratory syncytial virus RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection

contains.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and Respiratory syncytial virus RNA panel - Respiratory system specimen by NAA with probe detection
